description:
The young Makoto moves to the city of Iwatodai, where strange things happen: when he arrives by train at midnight, the inhabitants of the city suddenly turn into coffins in the so-called dark hour. Meanwhile, a boy with a strange contract is waiting for him in Gekkoukan High school`s dorm. In a fight against a giant creature, Makoto suddenly becomes persona and discovers unimaginable abilities.
Source: ProSieben MAXX
